# n8n_users (Data Source)

Fetches a list of all n8n users. Only available for instance owners.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `users` (Attributes List) List of users (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))

<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>

### Nested Schema for `users`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was created
- `email` (String) User email address
- `first_name` (String) User's first name
- `id` (String) User identifier
- `is_pending` (Boolean) Whether the user finished setting up their account
- `last_name` (String) User's last name
- `role` (String) User's global role
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the user was last updated
